item.title: INTERNATIONAL SUMMER DESIGN CAMP 2021: Smart Design City for Zero Carbon Emission
item.description: About Event INTERNATIONAL SUMMER DESIGN CAMP 2021: Smart Design City for Zero Carbon Emission

item.title: Blockchain for DeFi & Cryptocurrency: Blockchain in current and future economy
item.description: About Event In the wave of the 4.0 industrial revolution, blockchain is regarded as the “key” technology for digital transformation and the development of the technological platform of the future.

item.title: THE OPENING CEREMONY OF THE CITY SCIENCE LAB @ HO CHI MINH CITY
item.description: In the morning of April 22, 2021, the opening ceremony of the City Science Lab @ Ho Chi Minh City (CSL @ HCMC) was successfully celebrated at 422 Vo Van Kiet street, Co Giang ward, District 1.

item.title: Sustainable Urban Design
item.description: About Event Ngày 25/3, tại Hồ Chí Minh, Viện Đô thị thông minh và Quản lý hợp tác cùng B+H đã tổ chức buổi webinar chủ đề: “A new understanding of the imperative of healthy city design”.

item.title: INTERNATIONAL DESIGN COMPETITION SMARTCITY+
item.description: About Event Following the great success of the 1st international online international design competition in 2019 with the theme “Future City: Smart design for the post-pandemic world”, the annual contest launched by the Institute of Smart Cities and Management.

item.title: WEBINAR “A NEW UNDERSTANDING OF THE IMPERATIVE OF HEALTHY CITY DESIGN” OFFICIAL STARTS
item.description: About Event B+H, in partnership with Institute of Smart City and Management (ISCM), are pleased to invite you to an engaging conservation focused on the “Future of healthy and sustainable urban development in Vietnam”.

item.title: Recovery of travel and efforts to escape from the whirlwind influenced by Covid-19
item.description: About Event The year 2020 - 365 days of travel around the world were suspended and the phrase “closed” repeatedly appeared at tourist sites for the Covid epidemic.

item.title: Workshop and webinar week "Staycation, the hospitable city - Why not?"
item.description: On March 1st, 2021, the opening ceremony of workshop week with the theme “Global Strategies for Local Tourism” was successfully organized.

item.title: On the line of SMARTCITY+ Arttech Fusion Program of ISCM Event Series 2021
item.description: About Event We would like to invite you to participate the webinar “Livable smart city: how to build up for the sustainable future city”, with our international and local experts and professors of Vietnam, America, Belgium and England.

item.title: Culture, Cohesion and Civic Society: How Smart Cities Build on the Best of Our Past?
item.description: About Event On December 21st, 2020, the webinar “Culture, Cohesion and Civic Society: How Smart Cities Build on the Best of Our Past?

item.title: Unviersity of Economics Ho Chi Minh City hosted the Southeast Region of the national festival for innovative startups – TECHFEST 2020
item.description: About Event On November 24, 2020, Unviersity of Economics Ho Chi Minh City hosted the Southeast Region of the national festival for innovative startups – TECHFEST 2020.

item.title: International Launch Event
item.description: Institute of Smart City and Management (ISCM)-University of Economics HCMC (UEH) today has successfully organized an international launch event, along with the prize-giving ceremony for the 1st international design contest “Future city: design for the post-pandemic world”.

item.title: SMART CAMPUS PLANNING TOWARD SATELLITE CITY & COLLEGE TOWN
item.description: About Event As usual, in term of choosing institutions, students and their parents own a desire to be closer to their families while still wanting the best college education.

item.title: INNOVATIVE APPROACH
item.description: To adapt to rapid-development and urbanization, what innovative and innovative approaches will be suitable to solve or eliminate urban issues toward smart cities development?

item.title: SUSTAINABLE TRANSPORT SAFETY
item.description: Transport safety has always been a thorny issue that accounts for the majority of society’s concern, especially with the continued proliferation of private vehicles day by day.

item.title: FUTURE OUTLOOK
item.description: There is no doubt that the world is ever-changing, so planning a future outlook in which human always take the proactive role to operate is essential.
